attributes.action: Petition for no deal brexit on 31 October
attributes.additional_details:
Let's respect the democratic referendum result and leave Europe.

The politicians have been going back and forth for three long years now at vast expense to the taxpayer!!!

Enough is enough. No more dithering and costing the taxpayer more money!!

We voted to leave, democratically, so let's leave on 31 October and move on!!!!
attributes.background:
3 years ago the whole of the United Kingdom had a referendum on whether to leave the European Union or not. 

The result came back to leave!!!!

So let's get it done!!  Deal or no deal.
